module.name: time_interval
module.purpose: The Time interval application module supports the requirement to represent spans of time.

inscope.li: the naming of a time interval;
the representation of an identification of a time interval;
the representation of an organization or person in an organization that is the context for the identification of the interval;
the optional association of a date, date and time or event to represent the start of the interval;
the optional association of a date, date and time or event to represent the end of the interval;
the optional association of a measure to indicate the duration of the interval;
the representation of a relationship between time intervals.

outscope.li: all concepts not involved in the specification of the concepts of a time interval.

uof.name: Time_Interval
uof.description: The Time_Interval UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of Time_Interval.

aa.refpath: time_interval <- (applied_organization_assignment.items[i] applied_organization_assignment <= organization_assignment {organization_assignment.role -> organization_role organization_role.name='identifier'}) (applied_person_and_organization_assignment.items[i] applied_person_and_organization_assignment <= person_and_organization_assignment {person_and_organization_assignment.role -> person_and_organization_role person_and_organization_role.name='identifier'})
